Andrew Sharp

LinkedIn

I am helping create a more inclusive financial system at Circle. Previously I:

  • Founded the Workers KV team at Cloudflare.
  • Started my career as a Forward Deployed Engineer on an anti-money laundering deployment at Palantir.
  • Graduated from the University of Texas at Austin's 5-year BS/MS program in Computer Science (a combined Bachelor's and Master's degree program).

In the first years of my career I actively sought out opportunities to live and work around the globe. I interned at Google's office in Seoul and spent my first year at Palantir in the Singapore office. I have since settled down in my hometown, Houston, Texas, and welcomed the rise of remote work.

Good software serves as a foundation for us to do bigger and better things. I strive to build that foundation in all aspects of my work: from writing clear documentation to optimizing runtime performance. I am happiest when I see the impact of my work improve the effectiveness and satisfaction of my teammates and the broader organization.

In my free time I climb at my local bouldering gym, refine my burgeoning array of dotfiles, and tinker with home automation and keyboards. I enjoy reading about programming languages, distributed systems, and design.
